Name: Hitstun
About the game: Hitstun is a turn based fighting game. Play cards in your hand to move and attack. Win the game by reducing your opponent's health points to zero. Chain your Attack cards in a combo to show off your skills and deal more damage. Whether you like to play neutral, rush down, or zoning, express your playstyle with Movement cards. Choose between 8 different characters with all unique card lists.
Meta Title: Hitstun: Mar 22, 2023, Jab Lock Games Inc. and Full Overview
